factsheet.heading: About
paragraphs: Have you heard of The Gigglemugs? They are the once famous group of Croydon kids from Victorian days who went on amazing adventures and had loads of fun. Join storyteller and author Bernadette Russell as she tells the tales of these amazing children, and the day that they uncovered the incredible and surprising secrets of Croydon Town Hall. Plus: find out how to become a modern-day member of The Gigglemugs yourself!  This tour is designed for children aged 5-8 years old (siblings and grown ups welcome).

factsheet.heading: About Bernadette Russell
paragraphs: Bernadette Russell is an award-winning author and storyteller who has created shows for many venues including the Southbank Centre, National Theatre and Royal Albert Hall, as well as in the parks, forests, and beaches of the UK.
“Bernadette is the best storyteller I have ever seen… magical”, audience member, Butser Ancient Farm.
